feed.title: SolidInvoice Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for SolidInvoice: Release 2.3.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Ensure correct case for components dir by @pierredup in https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/pull/1630
  • Only show cron set up information when not running in Frankenphp by @pierredup in https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/pull/1629
  • Fix installation test by @pierredup in https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/pull/1632
  • Remove empty address when saving a new client by @pierredup in https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/pull/1631

Full Changelog: https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/compare/2.3.0...2.3.1

entry.title: New release for SolidInvoice: Release 2.3.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix migrating uuid to ulid by @pierredup in https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/pull/1638

Full Changelog: https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/compare/2.3.1...2.3.2

entry.title: New release for SolidInvoice: Release 2.3.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Improve static build script by @pierredup in https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/pull/1641
  • Only fetch recurring invoices that have recurring options set by @pierredup in https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/pull/1651
  • Add validation when creating a new company by @pierredup in https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/pull/1650
  • Remove unneeded env vars from docker-compose.yml config by @pierredup in https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/pull/1649
  • Fix saving address on settings page by @pierredup in https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/pull/1652

Full Changelog: https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/compare/2.3.2...2.3.3

entry.title: New release for SolidInvoice: Release 2.3.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix installation process by @pierredup in https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/pull/1658
  • Set default release version by @pierredup in https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/pull/1657
  • Don't override config directory if it is already set by @pierredup in https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/pull/1660
  • Remove Select2 and replace it with tom-select by @pierredup in https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/pull/1661
  • Fix email templates by @pierredup in https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/pull/1662
  • Use invoice/quote id when generating pdf files by @pierredup in https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/pull/1663

Full Changelog: https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/compare/2.3.3...2.3.4

entry.title: New release for SolidInvoice: Release 2.3.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix DB password resets during installation process by @pierredup in https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/pull/1666
  • Update mutable dates to immutable by @pierredup in https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/pull/1667
  • Simplify adding users to quotes and invoices by @pierredup in https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/pull/1668
  • Fix saving lines with decimal quantity by @pierredup in https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/pull/1670
  • fix billing controller to lookup by uuid by @pierredup in https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/pull/1671
  • Improve workflow buttons by @pierredup in https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/pull/1672

Full Changelog: https://github.com/SolidInvoice/SolidInvoice/compare/2.3.4...2.3.5
